abstract: Dell showcases the Streak, a tablet computer that is really an oversized smartphone.
snippet: Dell showcases the Streak, a tablet computer that is really an oversized smartphone.
lead_paragraph: On the heels of the Kno, a tablet for the college market, Dell introduced its own take on the tablet on Wednesday. The Streak, a 5-inch touchscreen device, had made appearances earlier at Google’s developer conference, but it received a fuller introduction at D8, The Wall Street Journal’s technology conference on Wednesday.

headline.main: Dell’s Streak, the Harbinger of Smartphone-Tablet Hybrids
